umcimbi: Nantoni na ethatha indawo kwaye inobunzima
amandla: Ukutyhala okanye ukutsalwa okunokubangela ukuba into ikhawuleze okanye itshintshe icala
athom: Iyunithi encinci yenkqunto enokuthi ithathe inxaxheba kwi-chemical reaction
imolekyuli: Iqela leathom ezimbini nangaphezulu ezidityaniswe ngokwekhemikhali kunye
isiqalelo: Into ecocekileyo eyenziwe ngohlobo olunye kuphela lweathom
ikhompawundi: Into eyenziwe ngezinto ezimbini okanye ngaphezulu ezahlukeneyo ezidityaniswe kunye ngokwekhemikhali
imeko yomcimbi: Uhlobo apho umba okhoyo (oqinileyo, ulwelo, igesi, iplasma)
umxhuzulane: Amandla atsala izinto ezinobunzima ukuya kwenye
isandi: Uhlobo lwamandla ahamba njengamaza ngendlela ephakathi
ubushushu: Umlinganiselo wokuba ishushu okanye ibanda kangakanani into
imozulu: Imozulu eqhelekileyo kwindawo ethile kwithuba elide
inkqubo yendalo: Uluntu lwezinto eziphilayo ezisebenzisanayo kunye nendawo yazo engaphiliyo
abemi: Iqela lezinto eziphilayo zohlobo olufanayo ezihlala kwindawo ethile
indaleko: Inkqubo apho amanani ezinto eziphilayo atshintsha ngokuhamba kwexesha
indalo iphela: Yonke into ekhoyo, kuquka into, amandla, indawo kunye nexesha
